titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: ACTIVITY PROPERTY EFFECTIVE TIME - Description

body.p: The time when an ACTIVITY PROPERTY became effective for a PATIENT .
Examples may be the time when the PATIENT was at a particular CRITICAL CARE LEVEL or when they started to be supported by a ventilator.
This item is not referenced in a data set in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. It has been retained to ensure the modelling is consistent.
